nsccsclub.isogum

Class FunctionActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsccsclub.isogum.FunctionActivity

  • public class FunctionActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    The home screen for the ISO GUM Uncertainty calculator. It contains a list of all previously defined user functions as well as a floating create button. This button links to the create activity and prompts the user to create a function or variable uncertainty object, then
